bibl.title: Paganus in B.G.U., 696.
James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers
bibl.author: Gilliam, James Frank

bibl.note: Reproduit de: AJP 73 (1952) pp. 75-78. B.G.U. II, 696 (= C.P.L. 118; Roman Mil. Rec. 64), 20. Discusses the meaning of paganus, the status of the centurion Candidus before his appointment.
Gilliam James Frank, Paganus in B.G.U., 696.
James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers = Mavors Roman Army Researches. 2 (Amsterdam, 1986) pp. 65-68; - 442.
